text: After the battle, I remember the Colonel ordered the burial of the dead. Sergeant Saldívar and eight soldiers took over the macabre operation. I remember I told Saldívar, "But listen, Sergeant, some people are not dead and you buried them the same way. Listen to them complaining. And the sergeant said to me, "If you'd listen to them, none of them would be dead". And he went on, no more, with the assignment. That's how he got promoted to sergeant major. FIN Falsifications, 1966
title: El eterno militar
author: Marco Denevi
